Results
GLUE
All our models outperform the uni-directional transformer ( OpenAI GPT ) of , however , our model is about 50 % larger than their model .

performs.from sentence: Our CNN base model performs as well as STILTs in aggregate , however , on some tasks involving sentence - pairs , STILTs performs much better ( MRPC , RTE ) ; there is a similar trend for BERT .

Constituency Parsing
This results in the bilm loss dominating the triplet loss and we found that scaling the bilm term by a factor of 0.15 results in better performance .

has.from sentence: shows that the cloze loss performs significantly better than the bilm loss and that combining the two loss types does not improve over the cloze loss by itself .
